name: 键盘侠Keyboardmen
description:
A game that can play the Internet Keyboard Man in person

In reality, he is docile. Once he enters the network, he immediately turns into a righteous chivalrous man to judge people. The keyboard in his hand is his weapon, and the virtual network is his shield. This is Keyman. This game allows players to play the role of keyboard man in the network and attack others wantonly in the online world. It can attack the rich and heartless rich, teach the people who have no sympathy but only eat, drink and play, and punish the traitors who use foreign products In short, in this game you can experience the feeling of being a judge god in the network!


Game features:

Diverse scenes
A total of 9 levels are designed for the game scenes, each of which has a different style, allowing players to travel around various places to defeat the enemy.

Diverse skills
Keyman has a variety of different skills, each of which has a unique function, which can slow down the enemy and make him dizzy, even pause for time, and drain HP. Players can freely choose skills to defeat many enemies.

Rich enemy types
In terms of enemies, in order to let players really experience the many enemies that keyboard man has to face, many colorful enemies are designed to be distributed in each level, and there are 23 bosses with unique styles waiting for players to challenge!


Write at the end:
In the early stage, you can upgrade your HP and armor value to ensure survival. The main menu includes game introduction and key introduction. The application of skills is described in detail in the skill upgrade on the selection page. Finally, have a good time!
